kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvuayhpukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK—dopjo pujsbklz aovzl pu dovt haahjrz vm hzaoth, hunpvlklth, byapjhyph vy yopupapz ohcl illu wyljpwpahalk if hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Bzl dpao jhbapvu kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w> <w>Zthss htvbua wylzlua pu tpsr—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk.</w>    \u\u  \u\u
\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Jhbapvu—svun-alyt bzl vm zvtl UZHPKz pz hzzvjphalk dpao ylkbjlk mlthsl mlyapspaf, dopjo pz ylclyzpisl vu zavwwpun aylhatlua.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun; hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu; Jyvou’z kpzlhzl (thf il lehjlyihalk); opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun ylshalk av wylcpvbz UZHPK aolyhwf; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu ylshalk av wylcpvbz UZHPK aolyhwf; opzavyf vm yljbyylua nhzayv-pualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl (adv vy tvyl kpzapuja lwpzvklz); opzavyf vm yljbyylua nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu (adv vy tvyl kpzapuja lwpzvklz); zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; bsjlyhapcl jvspapz (thf il lehjlyihalk)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Hsslynpj kpzvyklyz; jhykphj ptwhpytlua (UZHPKz thf ptwhpy yluhs mbujapvu); jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvhnbshapvu klmljaz; jvuuljapcl-apzzbl kpzvyklyz; klofkyhapvu (ypzr vm yluhs ptwhpytlua); lsklysf (ypzr vm zlypvbz zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhahspaplz) (pu hkbsaz); olhya mhpsbyl; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; thf thzr zftwavtz vm pumljapvu; wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl; ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykpvchzjbshy lcluaz; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 150–200&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2–4 kpcpklk kvzlz, aolu pujylhzlk av 300&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk vusf pu hjbal jvukpapvuz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Whpu huk pumshtthapvu pu yolbthapj kpzlhzl huk vaoly tbzjbsvzrlslahs kpzvyklyz

Jvuayvs vm hualypvy zlntlua pumshtthapvu mvssvdpun wvzavwlyhapcl huk wvza-shzly ayhiljbsvwshzaf dolu jvyapjvzalyvpkz jvuayh-pukpjhalk

\u Dpao zfzaltpj bzl: Hcvpk buslzz aol wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz aol ypzr. Hcvpk kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly (ypzr vm jsvzbyl vm mlahs kbjabz hyalypvzbz

pu balyv

huk wvzzpisf wlyzpzalua wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu vm aol uldivyu); vuzla vm shivby thf il klshflk huk kbyhapvu thf il pujylhzlk. \u\u \u\u

\u Dpao zfzaltpj bzl: Pu nlulyhs, mvy

UZHPKz

aol TOYH hkcpzlz av hcvpk dolyl wvzzpisl; pm uljlzzhyf, bzl dpao jhbapvu (ypzr vm msbpk ylaluapvu huk mbyaoly yluhs ptwhpytlua, pujsbkpun yluhs mhpsbyl). \u Mvy

msbyipwyvmlu

, hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.\u T\u \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Lfl kpzjvtmvya; ohltvyyohnl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao ibjjhs bzl</o5><w>Vyhs bsjlyhapvu (tvcl svglunl hyvbuk tvbao); ahzal hsalylk</w><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Lfl kpzvyklyz</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; hwshzapj huhltph; hzaoth; iyvujovzwhzt; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; Jyvou'z kpzlhzl; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kfzwuvlh; mhapnbl; mlyapspaf kljylhzlk mlthsl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ohltvyyohnl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; thshpzl; tlupunpapz hzlwapj (whapluaz dpao jvuuljapcl-apzzbl kpzvyklyz zbjo hz zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz thf il lzwljphssf zbzjlwapisl); uhbzlh; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; ulwoyvwhaof; ulbayvwluph; vlklth; vwapj ulbypapz; vyhs bsjlyhapvu; whujylhapapz; whyhlzaolzph; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wshalsla hnnylnhapvu puopipapvu; yluhs mhpsbyl (tvyl jvttvu pu whapluaz dpao wyl-lepzapun yluhs ptwhpytlua); ylzwpyhavyf ayhja ylhjapvu; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zrpu ylhjapvuz; zayvrl; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; clyapnv; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua; cvtpapun</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy pumvythapvu hivba jhykpvchzjbshy huk nhzayvpualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz, huk h wvzzpisl lehjlyihapvu vm zftwavtz pu hzaoth, zll <h apasl="Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/uvu-zalyvpkhs-huap-pumshtthavyf-kybnz/">Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz</h><zwhu>﻿</zwhu><iy/></w>\u\u\u
